column1: Club +1 melee (1d6) or claw +1 melee (1d4) or javelin +1 ranged (1d6)

Club +1 melee (1d6) and claw –1 melee (1d4) and bite –1 melee (1d4); or 2 claws +1 melee (1d4) and bite –1
            melee (1d4); or javelin +1 ranged (1d6)
Str 10, Dex 9, Con 14, Int 8, Wis 10, Cha 10

Clutch (2–5), squad (6–11 plus 1–2 monitor lizards), or band (20–80 plus 20% noncombatants plus 3–13 monitor
            lizards)
